column4: I have intalled Breezy on an old Gateway and everything is working fine except the sound. I get this looping noise of the drumming from the GNOME startup and I can not get it to stop. Does anyone know how to get ALSA to stop doing that?
have you killall esd yet in a terminal?
how might that help? If I kill esd, then the GNOME desktop will not have sound, which would mean Firefox and other apps would not have accessablity to the sound card, right?
you are completely right. it would stop the noise.
